body:
`alquimia@develop fails to build`

### Expected Result

`spack install xsdk@develop` builds

### Actual Result

```
==> Installing alquimia
==> Trying to clone git repository: https://github.com/LBL-EESA/alquimia-dev.git 
==> No checksum needed when fetching with git
==> Already staged alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5 in /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5
==> No patches needed for alquimia
==> Building alquimia [CMakePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'

5 errors found in build log:
     97     [ 40%] Building Fortran object alquimia/CMakeFiles/alquimia.dir/pflotran_alquimia_interface.F90.o
     98     cd /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5/alquimia-dev/spack-build/alquimia && /home/davydden/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18
            .04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/openmpi-3.1.0-sk3sszdaaz5rbybm5uldokyuihyulbgi/bin/mpif90 -Dalquimia_EXPORTS -I/home/davydden/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/petsc-
            develop-ggptktqotpsg4jjkvc22r25yvcwzhkjg/include -I/home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5/alquimia-dev/spack-build -I/home/d
            avydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5/alquimia-dev -I/home/davydden/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/pflotran-de
            velop-nwzflqq6fqjvybrpsi5qjkkrafqeblct/include -I/home/davydden/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/petsc-develop-ggptktqotpsg4jjkvc22r25yvcwzhkjg/include/pe
            tsc  -W -Wall -std=gnu -pedantic -Wno-unused-variable -Wno-unused-parameter -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -fPIC   -c /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3l
            trlrjuc6dvh74mlm5/alquimia-dev/alquimia/pflotran_alquimia_interface.F90 -o CMakeFiles/alquimia.dir/pflotran_alquimia_interface.F90.o
     99     /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5/alquimia-dev/alquimia/pflotran_alquimia_interface.F90:216:55:
     100    
     101       global_auxvar%den_kg = option%reference_water_density
     102                                                           1
  >> 103    Error: ‘reference_water_density’ at (1) is not a member of the ‘option_type’ structure
     104    /home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5/alquimia-dev/alquimia/pflotran_alquimia_interface.F90:884:32:
     105    
     106       option%reference_water_density = 997.16
     107                                    1
  >> 108    Error: ‘reference_water_density’ at (1) is not a member of the ‘option_type’ structure
     109    alquimia/CMakeFiles/alquimia.dir/build.make:156: recipe for target 'alquimia/CMakeFiles/alquimia.dir/pflotran_alquimia_interface.F90.o' failed
  >> 110    make[2]: *** [alquimia/CMakeFiles/alquimia.dir/pflotran_alquimia_interface.F90.o] Error 1
     111    make[2]: Leaving directory '/home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5/alquimia-dev/spack-build'
     112    CMakeFiles/Makefile2:90: recipe for target 'alquimia/CMakeFiles/alquimia.dir/all' failed
  >> 113    make[1]: *** [alquimia/CMakeFiles/alquimia.dir/all] Error 2
     114    make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/alquimia-develop-w5oa3bnoptktw3ltrlrjuc6dvh74mlm5/alquimia-dev/spack-build'
     115    Makefile:143: recipe for target 'all' failed
  >> 116    make: *** [all] Error 2

```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install xsdk@develop
```

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. Ubuntu 18.04
 2. gcc 7.3.0


@BarrySmith pinging as you added the package.
@balay I wonder if you have a fix for that as well in your branch :smile:
title: alquimia@develop fails to build
